Package core

Class Color.SmoothStepRgba

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Color.AbstrEasing
      • core.Color.SmoothStepRgba
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Utils.EasingFuncObject<Color>, Utils.QuadFunction<Color,​Color,​java.lang.Float,​Color,​Color>
    Enclosing class:
    Color
    public static class Color.SmoothStepRgba
extends Color.AbstrEasing
    Eases between two colors with the smooth step formula: t x t x ( 3.0 - 2.0 x t ) .
